movie.title: Comfort Farms
movie.description_intro: Accompanied by an unlikely group of veterans, animal-loving butchers, farmers and chefs, a former combat Army Ranger launches a new mission at Comfort Farms-a unique therapy farm meant to help those at high risk for suicide.
movie.description_full: Accompanied by an unlikely group of veterans, animal-loving butchers, farmers and chefs, a former combat Army Ranger launches a new mission at Comfort Farms-a unique therapy farm meant to help those at high risk for suicide.

movies.title: Eagles of Death Metal: Nos Amis
movies.title_english: Eagles of Death Metal: Nos Amis
movies.title_long: Eagles of Death Metal: Nos Amis (2017)
movies.summary: A little over a year ago, nine terrorists drove into Paris with guns, grenades, and suicide belts. They were there to perpetrate a coordinated, calculated mass murder on behalf of ISIL and, more symbolically, to launch an assault on culture itself, by turning the city's houses of mirth - soccer stadiums, cafés, restaurants, and of course, the Bataclan concert hall - into monuments to death and fear. They wanted to spill blood, to shut the West up.
movies.description_full: A little over a year ago, nine terrorists drove into Paris with guns, grenades, and suicide belts. They were there to perpetrate a coordinated, calculated mass murder on behalf of ISIL and, more symbolically, to launch an assault on culture itself, by turning the city's houses of mirth - soccer stadiums, cafés, restaurants, and of course, the Bataclan concert hall - into monuments to death and fear. They wanted to spill blood, to shut the West up.
movies.synopsis: A little over a year ago, nine terrorists drove into Paris with guns, grenades, and suicide belts. They were there to perpetrate a coordinated, calculated mass murder on behalf of ISIL and, more symbolically, to launch an assault on culture itself, by turning the city's houses of mirth - soccer stadiums, cafés, restaurants, and of course, the Bataclan concert hall - into monuments to death and fear. They wanted to spill blood, to shut the West up.

movies.title: One Life
movies.summary: Focuses on the cyclical journey taken by all living creatures, from birth to having youngsters of their own.
movies.description_full: Focuses on the cyclical journey taken by all living creatures, from birth to having youngsters of their own.
movies.synopsis: Focuses on the cyclical journey taken by all living creatures, from birth to having youngsters of their own.

movies.title: The Living Desert
movies.summary: A day in the life of creatures living in a desert in the southwestern US is shown. Toads, reptiles, wild pigs, insects, mice and birds are followed going about their daily routine and the struggle to find food and not become it themselves.
movies.description_full: A day in the life of creatures living in a desert in the southwestern US is shown. Toads, reptiles, wild pigs, insects, mice and birds are followed going about their daily routine and the struggle to find food and not become it themselves.

movies.title: Batman & Bill
movies.summary: Documentary about the uncredited co-creator of Batman, Bill Finger.
movies.description_full: Documentary about the uncredited co-creator of Batman, Bill Finger.
movies.synopsis: Documentary about the uncredited co-creator of Batman, Bill Finger.
